thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 10 of 517
thread.title: PAM R

author: PAM R
title: PAM R
text: Mostly happy with order process. Contacts were scheduled to be delivered on Sat, Jan 14 by US mail. Did not receive until Tues (MLK day on Mon), so actually took 9 days from date ordered. Since we sometimes receive packages on Sunday by US mail, it must not have been in the system even then. Not a big issue except concerned about leaving in mailbox for extended period of time in January in Ohio which caused me to continuously check if delivered. This was a delivery issue, not in OptiContacts control.
